TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ValidatorDisplay extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定验证控件中错误信息的显示行为。

span.span: Specifies the display behavior of error messages in validation controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举表示验证控件中的错误消息的不同的显示行为。The enumeration represents the different display behaviors of error messages in validation controls. 一个指定要仅显示中的错误消息控件。None specifies that you only want to display the error message in a control. 在验证控件中，将不显示错误消息。The error message will not display in the validation control. 静态指定你不想要更改时验证程序控件显示错误消息的 Web 页的布局。Static specifies that you don't want the layout of the Web page to change when validator controls display error messages. 显示页面时，将为的错误消息分配的页上的空间。Space on the page is allocated for the error messages when displaying the page. 验证程序内容是物理页; 的一部分因此，多个验证程序的相同的输入控件必须占用页上的不同位置。The validator contents are physically part of the page; therefore, multiple validators for the same input control must occupy different locations on the page. 动态指定你想要动态将错误消息放在网页上，验证失败时。Dynamic specifies that you want to dynamically place error messages on the Web page when validation fails. 不将验证内容的空间分配的页; 上因此，页动态更改以显示错误消息。Space for the validation content is not allocated on the page; therefore, the page dynamically changes to display the error message. 这允许多个验证程序共享的页上的同一物理位置。This allows multiple validators to share the same physical location on the page. 为了使页面布局更改显示一条错误消息时，包含验证程序的 HTML 元素必须调整大小足以容纳验证程序的最大大小。In order to keep the page layout from changing when an error message is displayed, the HTML element containing the validator must be sized large enough to accommodate the maximum size of the validator. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置，以便它们生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的验证控件的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to configure validation controls so that they generate markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay Dynamic = int32(2)

summary.span: 验证失败时动态添加到页面中的验证程序内容。

span.span: Validator content dynamically added to the page when validation fails.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay None = int32(0)

summary.span: 从不内联显示的验证程序内容。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay Static = int32(1)

summary.span: 作为页面布局的物理组成部分的验证程序内容。

span.span: Validator content physically part of the page layout.
